Environment: Primarily, before roots beginning in vowels or resonants followed by a vowel.
Before most clusters of multiple consonants.
Before n, or laryngeal obstruents followed by n.
In the above environment, but with a historically distinct group of bases
Before some bases beginning with i.
In the above environment, but with a historically distinct group of bases.
Before some bases beginning with ah.
Each appears with one verb root each, -sʼoht-, "hand," and -tsëh-, "fire," respectively.
